custom-sql.sql: SELECT COUNT(*) AS COUNT_VALUE FROM BookmarksEntry WHERE [$FOLDER_ID$]
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT BookmarksEntry.entryId) AS COUNT_VALUE FROM BookmarksEntry INNER JOIN BookmarksFolder ON (BookmarksFolder.folderId = BookmarksEntry.folderId) WHERE (BookmarksFolder.groupId = ?)

SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT BookmarksEntry.entryId) AS COUNT_VALUE FROM BookmarksEntry INNER JOIN BookmarksFolder ON (BookmarksFolder.folderId = BookmarksEntry.folderId) WHERE (BookmarksFolder.groupId = ?) AND (BookmarksEntry.userId = ?)

SELECT DISTINCT {BookmarksEntry.*} FROM BookmarksEntry INNER JOIN BookmarksFolder ON (BookmarksFolder.folderId = BookmarksEntry.folderId) WHERE (BookmarksFolder.groupId = ?) ORDER BY BookmarksEntry.modifiedDate DESC

SELECT DISTINCT {BookmarksEntry.*} FROM BookmarksEntry INNER JOIN BookmarksFolder ON (BookmarksFolder.folderId = BookmarksEntry.folderId) WHERE (BookmarksFolder.groupId = ?) AND (BookmarksEntry.userId = ?) ORDER BY BookmarksEntry.modifiedDate DESC
